ygData.subject: Re: Just a tought
ygData.msgSnippet: Huh? I haven t seen much that class is better than ours griping on this list, at all. I just started a DE Necro. My humie necro was only level 5, and I
ygData.messageBody:
Huh? I haven't seen much "that class is better than ours" griping on this
list, at all.

I just started a DE Necro. My humie necro was only level 5, and I figured
I'd back off of him and go the full-bore necromancer/evil guy way of life.
Plus the human had an INT of 105. This guy's got 130 INT.



-----Original Message-----
From: Liet [mailto:arrakis@...]
Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 1:55 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Just a tought


I 've been on many mailing lists for a while and all I hear is people
complaining about the other classes being better...
the mages complained about the necro the necro about the mages and so on.
If verant says the classes are balanced I trust em (except for the rogues
wich still dont have poisoning)
Of course the neighbor's grass is always more green.
So if you dont like the class just check out another but please stop pissing
me off with worthless "he got this and that, Im jealous".
Necro is a hard class to play if you are not good with tactics , you might
try a bard or something

Ghast Shin'Ra - Tunare
